name: Up and Down (itch) (momokohgames)
description:
This is a game I release in iOS appstore years ago. It wasn't available on iOS anymore as my developer account expired long time back.

This is a simple click the number in an ascending or descending order kind of game. Try it if you are free. Suggestions on how to improve it are welcomed. 

If you have android, you can also get it on google play store. Do download it and give a review. Thank you in advance.
